education_text.0: As a businessman, he is the founder and CEO of the software company      Wolfram Research Wolfram Research where he works as chief designer of      redirect    Mathematica and the      redirect    Wolfram Alpha Wolfram Alpha answer engineWolfram, at the age of 15, began research in applied      Quantum field theory quantum field theory and      Particle physics particle physics and published scientific papers in   In 1983, Wolfram left for the School of Natural Sciences of the      Institute for Advanced Study Institute for Advanced Study in PrincetonFrom 1992 to 2002, Wolfram worked on his controversial book      A New Kind of Science A New Kind of Science,                   which presents an empirical study of simple computational systems
